required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Esthetics and Patient-reported Outcomes of Single Implant Crowns
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Assessment of Esthetics and Patient-reported Outcomes of Single Implant Crowns

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this retrospective study is to perform an assessment of esthetic outcomes of single implants and obtain patient reported outcome measures through the use of a satisfaction questionnaire and the OHIP-14 (Oral Health Impact Profile) questionnaire. Dentists will be performing clinical examination including teeth charting and periodontal charting as well as pink/white esthetic score assessment and these outcomes will be compared to the level of patient satisfaction and patient reported outcomes. The results of this research will add evidence-based data on treatment recommendations for teeth replacement with implants from a patient-centered perspective.

primary_outcome.measure: PES/WES scores of single implant crowns in the anterior maxilla
primary_outcome.time_frame: the single implant crown should be "1 year" to "15 years" in function
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of pink esthetic score/white esthetic score (PES/WES) scores for implant supported prostheses

primary_outcome.time_frame: the single implant crown should be "1 year" to "15 years" in function
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of patient reported satisfaction with esthetics of implant supported single crowns

arm_group.arm_group_label: Single implant crowns in the anterior maxilla
arm_group.description: No drugs to be administered. Patients who have had a single implant crown placed since more than one year in the anterior maxilla (second premolar to second premolar) will be invited for a review session for dental examination and to fill the Oral Health Impact Profile (OHIP) questionnaire.

intervention.description: Regular dental examination, and the patient will be asked to fill a questionnaire
intervention.arm_group_label: Single implant crowns in the anterior maxilla

study_pop.textblock: Patients who had a single implant crown placed more than one year ago in the anterior maxilla (second premolar to second premolar) who fit the inclusion criteria

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients 18 years or older
- Good oral hygiene
- Single implant crown in the esthetic zone (maxillary 2nd premolar to 2nd premolar)
- Implant crown surrounded by natural teeth
- Implant crown opposed by natural dentition or fixed prostheses
- Implant crown has been installed for at least one year
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of active infection around the implant
- Presence of active periodontal disease in the esthetic area.
- Opposing removable prosthesis
